sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Paper, Box, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText } from '@mui/material';
import { Info, Code, Cloud, Update } from '@mui/icons-material';

const About = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ padding: '6rem 0', backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5' }}>
      <Container maxWidth="md">
        <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ padding: '3rem', marginTop: '3rem', backgroundColor: '#fff' }}>
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
            <Info sx={{ marginRight: '0.5rem', color: '#6C63FF' }} />
            <Typography variant="h4" component="h1" color="primary">
              About Storify
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph sx={{ marginBottom: '2rem', textAlign: 'center' }}>
            Storify is a platform that allows you to upload, download, and access your files easily.
          </Typography>

          <List>
            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Code color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="IT Switch Career Final Project" 
                secondary="This project showcases the skills and knowledge using React for the frontend, PHP for the backend, and MariaDB as the database."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Cloud color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Cloud Storage" 
                secondary="Access your files from anywhere, at any time, with our reliable cloud storage solutions."
              />
            </ListItem>

            <ListItem>
              <ListItemIcon>
                <Update color="primary" />
              </ListItemIcon>
              <ListItemText 
                primary="Version" 
                secondary="1.0.0"
              />
            </ListItem>
          </List>
        </Paper>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
